text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires identifying at least two values of verifying KPIs by internal audit or an independent assurance function. The response explicitly includes KPIs monitored by an 'Independent third-party substance review (Big 4)' (Control Point 4) and an 'Independent auditor rating' (Control Point 4), as well as an 'Independent assurance review (internal audit or external)' (Control Point 10) with a corresponding KPI ('Control Effectiveness Score'). Furthermore, the annual testing calendar (Section IX) and the final success metrics (Section X) heavily rely on external/independent assurance functions, clearly satisfying the requirement for identifying KPIs verified by such functions.", "criterion_id": "433fb637-b97d-41e1-9b0b-5540527c3a48"}
